uk.ac.susx.mlcl.lib.io
Interface CharChannel

All Superinterfaces:
Channel, Closeable, ReadableCharChannel, WritableCharChannel
All Known Implementing Classes:
CharFileChannel
public interface CharChannel
extends ReadableCharChannel, WritableCharChannel

A channel that can read and write bytes. This interface simply unifies ReadableCharChannel and WritableCharChannel; it does not specify any new operations.

Author:
Hamish Morgan <hamish.morgan@sussex.ac.uk>
